import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, Form, Row, Col, Image } from "react-bootstrap"; function login() { const [userInfo,setuserInfo] = useState({}) function handleChange(e){ setuserInfo({...userInfo, [e.target.name] : e.target.value}) console.log(userInfo) } return (
